content: अनुवृत्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Obeying, following &c. {@--2@} Uninterrupted, continuously kept up, continued; अनुवृत्तस्त्वया भगीरथगृहे प्रसादः <ls>U. 7.</ls> {@--3@} Rounded off; taperingly round ( क्रमशः वर्तुलाकार); दीर्घानुवृत्तपीनबाहुना <ls>K. 179.</ls> {@--4@} Supplied from a preceding rule &c. {@--5@} Conforming to the character (शीलानुगत). --त्तं Obedience, conformity, compliance; मूर्खं छंदोऽनुवृत्तेन (गृह्णीयात्) <ls>Chāṇ. 33.</ls>
